name: Ballerina Wrap Top
description: A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here. Note that the long sleeve version is only available as a paid pattern.
full_text: A free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here. Note that the long sleeve version is only available as a paid pattern. Add a trendy feminine touch to your wardrobe this fall with the Ballerina Wrap Top. This cropped cutie pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans or sailor pants and looks stunning on its own or atop a camisole. This sweater top moves from day to night effortlessly and also looks lovely and elegant with a pencil skirt and bandana scarf. SIZES XS (S, M, L, XL) (2XL, 3XL, 4XL, 5XL) Suggested negative ease: 0-2”/0-5cm Pictured in size S on model with 34”/86.5cm bust (short sleeve) and size M on model with 38”/96.5cm bust (long sleeve) FINISHED DIMENSIONS Bust circumference when closed: 28 (32, 36, 40, 44) (48, 52, 56, 60)”/ 71 (81.5, 91.5, 101.5, 112) (122, 132, 142, 152.5)cm Length: 16.5 (17, 17.5, 18.5, 19.5) (20.25, 21.75, 23, 24)”/ 42 (43, 44.5, 47, 49.5) (51.5, 55, 58.5, 61)cm DIFFICULTY LEVEL Intermediate SKILLS Knitting Purling M1l and m1r increases K2tog, k2tog tbl, and ssk decreases Working flat and in the round I-cord bind off Regular and applied I-cord All patterns are written in standard US terms.
